result.title: "Report #2 describing how CCS and ECCSEL ERIC are embedded in national strategies, roadmaps and funding programmes, both at country level and within in-country regions"
result.description: "Report #2 describing how CCUS and ECCSEL ERIC are embedded in national strategies, roadmaps and funding programmes, both at country level and within in-country regions. Based on the deliverables D16 and D18 as well as on the latest National Events reports, this report will set up recommendations and guidelines to encourage the positioning, use and development of ECCSEL ERIC within each country."

result.title: Updated ECCSEL ERIC Research Priorities
result.description: Building on the current ECCSEL Research Strategy which sets out the research and infrastructure priorities for CO2 storage and CO2 transport the document will be updated to reflect changes in European drivers and initiates and then work with the ECCSEL RICC to refresh the gap analysis and critically focus on developing industry research and infrastructure requirements for CO2 capture As well as refreshing the Strategy itself it provides a framework to steer the conceptual design study in WP24

result.title: Open Research Data Pilot
result.description: Note The Assay Providing User may request an optional grace period which allows for an indepth characterisation of the identified compounds and facilitates the publication of research findings in highlevel peerreviewed journals or the application for a patent If an IP position is being sought then a grace period of up to 24 month with the possibility to extend to 36 months in exceptional circumstances may be granted These grace periods align with current practice of other initiatives eg the IMI European Lead Factory which plans to release the Qualifiedhitlists of their projects after a defined grace period
